name: Bouncing Droids
description:
This Game was created for the Mini Ludum Dare 72: Elympics.

Bouncing Droids is a Puzzle game, where your objective is to bring your colored droids to their respective objectives, but the droids only move in a straight lline and only stop when they hit an obstacle.

It's still a basic Idea that I expect to develop further and maybe launch as a complete product. There are just a few levels, but I hope it is enough to get the feeling of the game.

Let me know what you think of the game, all feedback is appreciated and may be the key for pushing me into develloping the final product.

Update:

Added the TAB key as means of cicling between Droids

-- Fixed a bug that allowed the player to select other droids while the other was moving
